gcode.end_gcode:
G1 E-1 F2100 ; retract
{if max_layer_z < 180}G1 Z{min(max_layer_z+2, 180)} F720 ; Move print head up{endif}
G1 X178 Y178 F4200 ; park print head
{if max_layer_z < 180}G1 Z{min(max_layer_z+30, 180)} F720 ; Move print head further up{endif}
G4 ; wait
M104 S0 ; turn off temperature
M140 S0 ; turn off heatbed
M107 ; turn off fan
M221 S100 ; reset flow
M900 K0 ; reset LA
M84 ; disable motors

0.4.start_gcode:
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; extruder relative mode
M104 S170 ; set extruder temp for bed leveling
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; set bed temp
M109 R170 ; wait for bed leveling temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp
M204 T1250 ; set travel acceleration
G28 ; home all without mesh bed level
G29 ; mesh bed leveling 
M204 T[machine_max_acceleration_travel] ; restore travel acceleration
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set extruder temp
G92 E0
G1 Y-2 X179 F2400
G1 Z3 F720
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for extruder temp

; intro line
G1 X170 F1000
G1 Z0.2 F720
G1 X110 E8 F900
G1 X40 E10 F700
G92 E0

M221 S95 ; set flow
